```{r}
library('DEoptimR')


Ackley= function(x)
  {
  Num=length(x)
	firstSum = 0.0
	secondSum = 0.0
	Euler=exp(1)
	for (i in 1:Num)
	  {
		firstSum =firstSum+ x[i]**2.0
		secondSum=secondSum+ cos(2.0*pi*x[i])
		}
	fun=-20.0*exp(-0.2*sqrt(firstSum/Num)) - exp(secondSum/Num) + 20 +Euler
  return(fun)
  }
# f(x)=0 x=(0,0) [âˆ’32, 32]

ITE=2000
dim=30
RUNS=50
Y=0;X=0
NPAR=100
Bounds=32
for(i in 1:RUNS)
  {
  JDE_R=JDEoptim(rep(-Bounds, dim), rep(Bounds, dim), Ackley,
         tol = 1e-20,NP=NPAR, trace = FALSE,  maxiter =ITE)
  Y[i]=JDE_R$value

  }



MEAN=mean(Y)
STD=sd(Y)
MAX=max(Y)
MIN=min(Y)
cat('Ackley JDE DIM=',dim,'RUNS=',RUNS,'Bounds=',-Bounds, Bounds,'\n')
cat('MEAN=',MEAN,'\n')
cat('MAX',MAX,'\n')
cat('MIN=',MIN,'\n')
cat('STD',STD,'\n')


```
